greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^A135560(n) - 1.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := 1 + IntegerExponent[n, 2] + Sum[(-1)^(n - k - 1)*Binomial[n - 1, k]* Sum[Binomial[k, 2^j - 1], {j, 0, k}], {k, 0, n - 1}]; Table[2^f[k] - 1, {k, 1, 20}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 17 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 01 2008
